channel.title: Posts on My Linux / Homelab Experiments
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Linux / Homelab Experiments

item.title: Pi Hole V6 Update
item.description:
Over the last week, Pi-hole has officially released the long awaited V6. So now V5 will no longer receive updates.
I have been running 2 Pi-hole V6 Beta on bare metal (Raspberry pi4) for the past 6 months, so now is the time to update them to the official release.

How to upgrade

sudo apt upgrade && sudo apt upgrade -y
sudo pihole checkout master
sudo pihole -up

That should be it. As a side note I have been using nebula-sync to keep the 2 Pi-hole in sync.

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Happy New Year

Welcome to my little digital playground, where I try out new things. Sometimes it works, sometimes not.

I have successfully deployed this to GitHub pages.
